title: Workflows
subtitle: Track task dependencies and workflow progress across departments
prerequisitesDescription: Select tasks that must be completed before this task can start
circularDependencyError: Cannot add this prerequisite - it would create a circular dependency
waitingDescription: This task is waiting for its prerequisite(s) to be completed
noWorkflowsDescription: Workflows are created when tasks with prerequisites are added to events
confirmAddPrerequisitesDescription: The selected task "{{taskName}}" has the following prerequisites that will also be added:
cannotDeletePrerequisiteDescription: This task is a prerequisite for other tasks. Delete the dependent tasks first, or contact a superadmin.
deleteTaskChainDescription: This will delete the task and all dependent tasks. Are you sure?
viewOnlyAccessDescription: You can view and comment on this task, but cannot modify it
